org.jcvlib.core

Class Size

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.core.Size

  • public class Size
extends java.lang.Object
    Contain [height, width] size of image, rectangle or something else. This is immutable object -- you can not change values of it after creation.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Size(int width, int height)
      Create new size.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
      Return true if current size equivalent to object from parameter and false otherwise.
      Point getCenter()
      Return center of element with current size.
      int getHeight()
      Return height of saved size.
      int getN()
      Return number of elements (pixels, values and etc.) into current size (same as getWidth() * getHeight()).
      int getWidth()
      Return width of saved size.
      boolean lessOrEqualsThan(Size size)
      Return true if current size less or equals on width and height than given.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Return string with values of this size.

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

        public int getN()
        Return number of elements (pixels, values and etc.) into current size (same as getWidth() * getHeight()).

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
        Return true if current size equivalent to object from parameter and false otherwise.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • lessOrEqualsThan

        public boolean lessOrEqualsThan(Size size)
        Return true if current size less or equals on width and height than given.

      • getCenter

        public Point getCenter()
        Return center of element with current size.

        For example if we have size [3 x 2] this method return point (1, 0) (not (1, 1)!). This method round down to odd size and then found a center!

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return string with values of this size.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
